word: 9 (chs 3:5; 19:7-9; John 12:12, 13). The Palms and the Robes.--The palms signify that they have gained the victory, and the white robes that they have been clothed with the righteousness of Christ. Thank God that a fountain has been opened to wash our robes of character, and make them as white as snow (Und. MS 23).
